Uses of Interface
com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.DdlBuffer

  • Packages that use DdlBuffer 
    Package Description
    com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration  
    com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform  

    • Uses of DdlBuffer in com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration

      Methods in com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration that return DdlBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DdlBuffer DdlBuffer.append(String content)
      Append DDL content to the buffer.
      DdlBuffer DdlBuffer.append(String type, int space)
      Append DDL content to the buffer with space padding.
      DdlBuffer DdlBuffer.appendWithSpace(String foreignKeyRestrict)
      Append a value that is potentially null or empty and proceed it with a space if so.
      DdlBuffer DdlWrite.apply()
      Return the buffer that APPLY DDL is written to.
      DdlBuffer DdlWrite.applyForeignKeys()
      Return the buffer that APPLY DDL is written to for foreign keys and their associated indexes.
      DdlBuffer DdlWrite.applyHistory()
      Return the buffer that apply history DDL is written to.
      DdlBuffer DdlWrite.drop()
      Return the buffer that destructive changes are written to.
      DdlBuffer DdlWrite.dropHistory()
      Return the buffer that is used when history is no longer required on a table or specific columns.
      DdlBuffer DdlBuffer.end()
      End of a change - add some whitespace.
      DdlBuffer DdlBuffer.endOfStatement()
      Append the end of statement content.
      DdlBuffer DdlBuffer.newLine()
      Append new line character to the buffer.
      DdlBuffer DdlWrite.rollback()
      Return the buffer that ROLLBACK DDL is written to which is considered safe to run when apply changes fail to execute.
      DdlBuffer DdlWrite.rollbackForeignKeys()
      Return the buffer that ROLLBACK DDL is written to for foreign keys and associated indexes.
